item.title: Blog-Website-Construction
item.description: Personal Blog Building brief introduction hugo : The blog generation framework used in this article github : Blog dynamic remote storage warehouse (realize web page dynamic refresh) netlify : Web hosting (Publication of web pages) Git: Complete the remote warehouse download and push tool Environment Construction R compiled language Choose a close mirror image Select an installation package for your operating system , and performing the installation R studio Download and installation Hugo

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
